response.overview: Princess Elisabeth, Betty, literally has everything everyone dreams of: beautiful dresses, valuable jewelry and she lives in a fairytale castle. But Betty is actually unhappy, because her busy princess schedule doesn't allow any free time, and certainly not to learn how to ride a horse. One night, Betty is so fed up with everything that she decides to take a look at the royal stable. Here she meets Pina, an adventurous, enthusiastic rider, and suddenly the girls' lives take a completely different turn, full of funny moments and obstacles...
response.title: Playmobil: Princess for a day

titles.title: Een keer prinses, twee keer prinses
